snippet: When Lt. Mike Madden pulled up to the scene of what would be one of the worst massacres the United States has seen in years, his training kicked in.
abstract: Police Lt Mike Madden, at press conference, recounts his experience during mass shooting in San Bernardino, Calif; Madden, who typically has administrative job in department, underscores degree to which training he underwent for active-shooter situations was invaluable.
lead_paragraph: When Lt. Mike Madden pulled up to the scene of what would be one of the worst massacres the United States has seen in years, his training kicked in.

headline.main: An Officer Who Trained for the Worst and Faced It: ‘This Was Actually Happening’
headline.print_headline: An Officer Who Trained for the Worst and Faced It: ‘This Was Actually Happening’

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Madden, Mike (San Bernardino, Calif, Police Officer)
